name: _SHiFT
description:
Flash Through Fibre Optic

Fly at light speed through firewall-infested corridors of fibre-optic cables. In _SHiFT, players pilot a craft, in a mission to break through to the light at the end of the tunnel. This game is a single player standalone experience designed to exhibit my knowledge of Unreal Engine 4 and its Blueprint visual scripting language.
